description: Try our easy to follow Tasty Miso Tofu Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Japanese curry,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Vegan,Tofu,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tasty Miso Tofu Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lemon, 1 juiced 2 tbs, 1 cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Cut tofu into 8 slices. Press with paper towel to remove excess moisture. Lightly dust with cornflour.
Heat 1 tbs oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add tofu and cook for 1 minute each side or until golden. Transfer to a plate.

Heat remaining oil. Add onion and garlic and cook for 3 minutes or until softened. Add curry powder and stir for 1 minute or until aromatic. Stir miso paste into 1/2 cup warm water to dissolve. Add to pan with coconut milk and stir well to combine. Add sweet potato and beans to pan and simmer for 5 minutes or until softened.
Stir in lemon juice and pour curry sauce over tofu. Scatter with spring onion and coriander. Serve with lemon cheeks.
